Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 42nd overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2011...
Traded from Cincinnati to Houston on 1/31/2012 (Going to CIN: 1B S. Cox. Going to HOU: C A. Hedges)...
Traded from Houston to Pittsburgh on 2/12/2012 (Going to HOU: 1B A. Dykstra, C C. Tankersley, P C. Reitsma. Going to PIT: P C. Volstad, C A. Hedges, P N. Grajeda)...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Cleveland on 1/31/2016 (Going to PIT: LF A. Shipman, P S. Diamond. Going to CLE: C A. Hedges, P B. Kim)...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/20/2017, off Bunjiro Yasuoka (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/28/2017, off Neftali Feliz (NYA)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 2018...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Los Angeles (A) on 6/29/2019...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 2019...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 2020...
Traded from Cleveland to Pittsburgh on 5/15/2021 (Going to CLE: C M. McHenry, LF J. Olson. Going to PIT: C A. Hedges)...
Signed as a free agent by Florida on 2/9/2023 to a 1-year deal worth $2,525,252 per year...
